feed.title: Creation: Latest Hot Topics by Louise Scott (Atom)

entry.title: Tae Kwon Do Red Stripe
entry.content:
On the 10th May I successfully passed my grade for Red Stripe in Tae Kwon Do, as I get ever nearer to the Black Belt the syllabus becomes more difficult and challenging.

I started the sport in December 2003 and joined my twin sister who decided to start again after taking a break to have her children. I would like to take the opportunity to thank my instructor and other members of the club for all their support. I hope to continue the sport for many years to come. Please visit the club website.

entry.title: Holly
entry.content: On December 21st we had a new addition to our family, Holly, a Shih tzu puppy. She was born on 2nd November 2006 and is growing fast. When we first had her you could hold her in the palm of your hand. The whole family love her to bits.
